Global Styles for JSS

If you want to write regular globally scoped CSS with JSS, this plugin is for you. Donâ€™t use it if you can avoid it.

Top level global declarations block

const styles = {
  '@global': {
    body: {
      color: 'green'
    },
    a: {
      textDecoration: 'underline'
    }
  }
}

Top level global prefix

const styles = {
  '@global body': {
    color: 'green'
  }
}

Nested global declarations block

const styles = {
  button: {
    float: 'left',
    '@global': {
      span: {color: 'red'}
    }
  }
}

Nested global prefix

const styles = {
  button: {
    float: 'left',
    '@global span': {color: 'red'}
  }
}

Issues

File a bug against cssinjs/jss prefixed with [jss-global].

Run tests

npm i
npm run test
